tag_list: bankruptcy-law, chapter-7, chapter-13, bk-attorney, banruptcy-lawyer, debt-reduction
overview:
Jeffrey A. Cancilla graduated from the University of Oregon school of law in 1992, and has over 20 years legal experience in both government and the private practice of law. He receiveed a Bachelor’s of Arts from the University of Oregon.

His expertise is in assisting clients with debt issues through the use of bankruptcy law, fair credit law, and debt negotiation.
